page.title: 08Food in Thorpe Hesley.
page.content: People have convenience foods because it is quick and easy. If you had a steak it would take about two hours to prepare but with sausages or fishfingers it is easier and quicker to do and saves on power. With a microwave it is even quicker and cleaner.People do not always want convenience foods when they have a barbecue people cook sausages, steaks etc. in the old fashioned way, because it is good fun and tasty when done in the right way.Some food is junk food it makes you fat and not healthy. People buy fish and chips from chipshops they also buy curry from a chinese takeaway. There are take away fried chicken shops and baked potato shops. Not many go short of food compared with people in Africa.
